propertyDefinition.name: FunctionalBlock1Active
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates whether the functional block 1 (Max current check) is active.

propertyDefinition.name: FunctionalBlock2Active
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates whether the functional block2 is active (BCM check for Bireu, Neutron detection for Baeu) is active.

propertyDefinition.name: NoBeamIntegrationTime1
propertyDefinition.description: The integration time of the functional block 1.

propertyDefinition.name: NoBeamIntegrationTime2
propertyDefinition.description: The integration time of the functional block 2.

propertyDefinition.name: NoBeamThreshold1
propertyDefinition.description: The current threshold (max) of the functional block 1.

propertyDefinition.name: NoBeamThreshold2
propertyDefinition.description: The current threshold (max) of the functional block 1.

propertyDefinition.name: ServiceStarted
propertyDefinition.description: Flag indicating if the service is started.

propertyDefinition.name: ConfigParametersCheckOk
propertyDefinition.description: Flag indicating if the Bireu/Baeu is properly configured.
